vCard.DESC:
With this service you can receive email notifications.
Security warning: Be careful when using this. Your password will travel in clear from your client to your jabber server if you don't use SSL and it will probably travel in clear from the jabber server to your email server. Use with care. This shouldn't be an issue in your Intranet, but it is if you use an ILE installed in a foreign jabber server.
